DeathSteel::

He smiled. "Perhaps our leader would be in  a better mood if someone 
gave him a few doses of energon to calm his temper eh?" with a slight 
chuckle. "Besides, new ones need a good yelling at. I've taken mine 
as I needed them. It builds strength in the new recruits."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor smiled "Then go to mess hall, Hydras is screaming up to 
> new comer so his temper will be pretty bad for a while." He walked 
> along side DeathSteel.
